Name: Rogue Production Facility
About the game: RPF is a simple real-time strategy game with lush graphics and easy gameplay. You mine resources and send your medieval units from one floating island to another to conquer enemies who reside there in quest of treasure and empire. There are archers, catapults, ballistas, swordmen, cavalry, mages and priests and more. In total there are over 20 unit types. The game features simple automatic unit targeting (AI if you would call it that) for single player. The game is made by a single developer in Unity.
